CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 14, 1966, pg. 1A, reads: "Breakthrough - Stage star Eartha Kitt was on hand in the Hill District last week to help citizens launch a massive 'self help' drive to renew the community. On exhibition was a remodeled slum home.  Effort is sponsored by Citizens Committee on Hill District Renewal.  Eartha was appearing in city in presentation of stage play 'Owl and Pussycat.'  - Harris Photo."Harvey Adams was a Pittsburgh Housing Authority officer and local NAACP chapter president.
TitMainTitle: Eartha Kitt leaping though poster to launch a Citizens Committee on Hill District Renewal program, with police officer Harvey Adams, Vine and Colwell Streets, Hill District
